title: Localization Test Vector Set
description: Schema for a file containing a set of localization test vectors.

$schema.description: The JSON Schema URL this document adheres to.

vectorSetId.description: A unique identifier for this set of test vectors (e.g., snfei-localization-us).

specVersion.description: The version of the specification the vectors are testing.

vectorVersion.description: The version of the test vector set itself.

description.description: A brief description of the purpose of this test vector set.

generatedAt.description: The date the test vector file was generated (YYYY-MM-DD).

vectors.description: An array of individual localization test cases.

id.description: Unique identifier for the specific test case (e.g., loc_us_001).

description.description: A descriptive name for the test case.

function.description: The name of the localization function being tested (always 'apply_localization').

input.description: The input data for the localization function.

name.description: The name or acronym to be localized.

jurisdiction.description: The jurisdiction context (e.g., US, us/ca, ca/on).

expected.description: The expected output from the localization function.

notes.description: Optional notes or rationale for the test case.
